snippet.title: Title: Salmonella chemoreceptors McpB and McpC mediate a repellent response to L-cystine: a potential mechanism to avoid oxidative conditions
snippet.description:
Title: Salmonella chemoreceptors McpB and McpC mediate a repellent response to L-cystine: a potential mechanism to avoid oxidative conditions
Authors: Milena D. Lazova, Mitchell T. Butler, Thomas S. Shimizu, Rasika M. Harshey
Comments: 55 pages including 6 figures, 2 tables and 5 supplementary figures. This article has been published in Molecular Microbiology (Mol Microbiol. 2012 May;84(4):697-711. doi: 10.1111/j.1365-2958.2012.08051.x. Epub 2012 Apr 23)
Journal-ref: Lazova, M. D., Butler, M. T., Shimizu, T. S., and Harshey, R. M., Salmonella chemoreceptors McpB and McpC mediate a repellent response to L-cystine: a potential mechanism to avoid oxidative conditions. Mol Microbiol 84 (4), 697 (2012)
Subjects: Molecular Networks (q-bio.MN)
